sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 家庭是社会的基本单位。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiātíng shì shèhuì de jīběn dānwèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La famille est l'unité de base de la société.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Family is the basic unit of society.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois assumer les conséquences.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You must bear the consequences.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'arbitre a déclaré qu'il avait commis une faute.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The referee ruled that he committed a foul.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǐshì píngcháng de yī tiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est juste un jour ordinaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is just an ordinary day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Avec les taxes, cela fait cent yuans au total.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Including taxes, it's one hundred yuan in total.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce champignon est toxique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This mushroom is poisonous.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps nous est défavorable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather is unfavorable to us.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce problème n'est pas facile à résoudre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This problem is not easy to solve.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux parties ont convenu de signer le contrat.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Both parties agreed to sign the contract.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè wánměi de jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un plan parfait.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a perfect plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'opinion des masses est très importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The opinion of the masses is very important.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiàng shàngjí huìbào le qíngkuàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a fait un rapport à ses supérieurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He reported the situation to his superiors.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est ivre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is drunk.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这部电影的题材很独特。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù diànyǐng de tícái hěn dútè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le thème de ce film est très original.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The theme of this movie is very unique.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 政策应该为老百姓服务。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les politiques devraient servir le peuple.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Policies should serve the common people.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est trop sûr de lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is too confident.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你知道如何使用这台机器吗？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ zhīdào rúhé shǐyòng zhè tái jīqì ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sais-tu comment utiliser cette machine ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you know how to use this machine?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gǎnmào le, yīzhí dǎ pēntì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a un rhume et n'arrête pas d'éternuer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a cold and keeps sneezing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tóuzī le yī gè jījīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a investi dans un fonds.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He invested in a fund.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le surmenage est nocif pour la santé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Overworking is harmful to health.
